headline: MGM RESORTS PROMOTES ARI KASTRATI TO CHIEF CONTENT, HOSPITALITY AND DEVELOPMENT OFFICER
summary: MGM Resorts International (NYSE: MGM) ("MGM Resorts" or the "Company") today announced the promotion of Ari Kastrati to Chief Content, Hospitality and Development Officer, effective immediately. In his new role, Kastrati will oversee the Company's global design and development efforts and sports and entertainment partnerships. He also will continue to drive the Company's hospitality strategy, including the development of food and beverage and nightlife concepts, and lead the Company's lifestyle,

headline: MGM Resorts names chief content, hospitality and development officer
summary: The resort operator promoted Ari Kastrati to the role, in which he will oversee global design and development as well as MGM’s sports and entertainment partnerships.
